    • Method Detail

      • addReview

        @GetMapping(value="/reviews/add")
public java.lang.String addReview(@RequestParam
                                                                    java.lang.String auctionId,
                                                                    @RequestParam
                                                                    java.lang.String stars,
                                                                    @RequestParam
                                                                    java.lang.String review)
        This mapping adds a new review to the website. There is not validation in the backend, but using the current logic, this can be accessed only after special conditions are met (see ReviewService.addReview(String, String, String, String))

      • deleteReview

        @GetMapping(value="/reviews/delete")
public java.lang.String deleteReview(@RequestParam
                                                                          java.lang.String id,
                                                                          @RequestParam(value="sellerName",required=false)
                                                                          java.lang.String sellerName)
        Endpoint used for deleting a review. Only admins can delete reviews.

      • showReviews

        @GetMapping(value="/reviews")
public java.lang.String showReviews(@RequestParam(value="sellerName",required=false)
                                                                  java.lang.String sellerName,
                                                                  org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        This method is used for retrieving all the auctions reviews.
        Parameters:
        sellerName - the name of the seller to filter by (it can also be empty)
